review: A great product!  Very easy to use, even for my kids.  I used to use our Wii for Netflix but its interface required you to be very exact with pointing and clicking.  The Amazon buttons are so much easier and the device is tiny but packed with power.  The one reason I didn't give it five stars is the voice search, which is awesome and very accurate by the way, only searches Amazon content--not apps like Netflix (even when you're within the Netflix app).  Obviously that's competition for Amazon Prime streaming service so I understand why they didn't try to make it integrate, but that's a glaring issue for me.  I rarely use the voice search because of it, and Prime's streaming service doesn't have enough content (at least not yet) for me to switch to it wholesale.
